info.name: DentalHQ
info.description: A collection of API endpoints built for the DentalHQ API

request.description: Toggles the flag on a user record for waiving the cancellation fee on cancelling a dentist subscription plan
Toggles the flag on a user record for waiving the re-enrollment fee on subscribing to any dentist subscription plan
Creates a JSON Web Token used for authorization to related resources.
Creates a JSON Web Token used for authorization to related resources.
(Limited to ADMIN users only) Creates a JSON Web Token used for authorization to related resources.
Subscribes the current logged in user to the membership plan provided by the dentist and checks if this is a first enrollment vs. re-enrollment. If re-enrolling, there is a fee applied to the user.

item.name: Subscribe Family Member to Dentist Plan

request.description: Subscribes the related family member to the dentist's plan and checks if this is a first enrollment vs. re-enrollment. If re-enrolling, there is a fee applied to the user.

Changes the selected subscription plan of the current user with the Dentist. (**Changes are prorated**). You can also call this endpoint when you need to re-activate a user's subscription. This option avoids the re-enrollment fee which is applied when switching doctors.
Retrieves information about the current user's or member's subscription plan (i.e. costs, When did it began, and status)
Retrieves information about the member's subscription plan (i.e. costs, status, and when it started)
Cancel's the subscription of the current user account. If the user is cancelling after the free-cancellation period, the user account will be charged the cancellation fee cost.
Changes the value of the cancellation fee waiver flag on the user record
